tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Convert content from various sources to structured Markdown format.

    Args:
        source: The source of the content (HTTP/HTTPS URL, file path, or data URI).

    Returns:
        The converted content in Markdown format.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the source type is not supported or conversion fails.

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将本地HTML文件正确转换为Markdown格式

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: '﻿

使用utf-8编码插入的HTML段落

'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将本地Word文档正确转换为Markdown格式

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否处理以数据URI形式提供的文本内容并转换为Markdown

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能处理隐藏文件的转换请求

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'This is a hidden file.'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具在遇到不支持的文件类型时是否抛出ValueError

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具在给定无效URL时是否能优雅地报错

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Client error '404 Not Found' for url 'https://example.com/nonexistent_document.docx'
For more information check: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/404

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能够处理包含特殊字符的文件路径
